DOC.brief_summary: Open-Label , multiple-dose , drug interaction study assess effect nevirapine pharmacokinetics atazanavir HIV-infected individual .
DOC.criteria: sign informed consent form For Cohort 1 , HIVinfected subject receive nevirapine 200 mg twicedaily 2 3 NRTIs least 6 week For Cohort 2 , HIVinfected subject receive atazanavir 300 mg ritonavir 100 mg oncedaily 2 3 NRTIs least 6 week Have 2 measurement plasma HIV RNA < 400 copies/mL . The first test 6 16 week prior second within 3 week prior Day 1 Have CD4 cell count > =200 cells/mm3 Body Mass Index 18 35 kg/m2 . Men woman , age 18 55 . Women pregnant breastfeed Presence newly diagnose HIVrelated opportunistic infection CD4 cell count < 200 cell/mm3 within previous 6 month . Any significant acute chronic medical illness , unless stable control nonprohibited medication . History virologic failure antiretroviral regimen .
